sub_fields.label: Constrain grid width?
sub_fields.name: grid_width
sub_fields.instructions: If set to "no", the grid will run the full width of the browser.

sub_fields.label: Grid Background Image Size
sub_fields.name: grid_background_image_size
sub_fields.instructions: If using a custom value, enter the background position coordinates (x and y).  Use either percentage values (better for responsive) or pixel values.  (e.g. 50% 20% or 100px 50px).

sub_fields.name: customize_section_background_image
